transcript: - Hey guys, it's Justine. And today is a very, very exciting day. We are about to unbox a brand new custom PC. This was built by Mods By Ben, who is an incredible PC designer but also an amazing photographer. And he merges those two passions together on his Instagram. You guys have to check it out. He partnered with ASUS to build this custom PC for me and I cannot wait to open it up. But before we do, we're gonna chat with Ben and talk about some of his inspiration behind this build. And also Chris from ASUS to tell us what's actually inside the PC. Guys, oh my gosh. Thank you so much for joining me in this-- the zoom call here (chuckles). - Good to be here . - Thanks for having us. - Hi, Chris. Hi, Ben. Okay, so Ben, do you want to do a quick little introduction of yourself so that my audience is a little more familiar with what you've been up to. I've been following you on Instagram for a while now. And honestly, your photography is so incredible. - Well, my name is Ben with Mods By Ben, and I'm actually a PC builder. I do custom PCs with ASUS so a lot of my stuff is it's more water-cooled. So it tends to be more extreme than just a normal PC build. - I work for ASUS, I'm a part of the social media team. And I do a variety of things. I do a lot of video work. Some instructional videos and long-form content. Just a little bit of everything here. - And we had actually met in 2011, you said, right? - We did. We were both entered into a charity PC building race through I believe it was Tiger Direct. It was really, really fun. - It was so fun, yeah. We had a PC building race and I was like, "I don't think I'm going to beat any of these people here." I didn't come in last. So I appreciate your help. So thank you so much (chuckles). - Glad to help. - And now here we are coming full circle. 2021 and I'm getting a new PC build. And this is really exciting because I'd started streaming during the whole pandemic again. And streaming was great. But also, streaming on a PC and then also gaming on the PC like I was like, "Man, this is not ideal."
